column1: Per the County's master plan for space needs, a school administration building will be constructed and located at the County Courthouse Complex
This project has been deferred to FY 2020 - $5,275,000
Per the demographic study conducted in 2007, a new elementary school will be needed in the northern area of the county due to projected populatio
however, the subcommittee recommended deferring this project to FY 2020 - $20,375,000

column2: 1996 one wing dates to 1970s, gym dates to 1930s
